---
name: Main Clause Revision
about: Revise an entire top-level clause.

---

Top-level clauses are such as: 12, 15, 16 etc.

## Which main-level clause?

Example: **12**, **15**, **60**

## What should it be now?

```
15) Example
    a) More example
    b) More more
        i) More
        ii) Even more
```

## Why should it be changed?

Answer
